roleset.name: assign attribute
roleset.note: ASCRIBE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'ascribe' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from ascribe.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Ko Yu - fen ascribes the success of the daughter - in - law series to several factors :
example.arg: the success of the daughter - in - law series

example.name: passive
example.text: As a public figure, Mr. Masson had to prove malice and, as proof of malice, Mr. Masson contended that [defamatory quotations]-2 ascribed *trace*-2 to him by Ms. Malcolm were in fact fabricated.
